pr_title: Additions to the mdk build.gradle to accommodate datagens.

timeline.message:
Added generated resources to sourceSets
Added --existing to runData

timeline.bodyText:
This requires both srcDir 'src/generated/resources' as well as srcDir 'src/main/resources'.
Since right now you only allow the generated resources to be used.
timeline.author: OrionDevelopment

replies.bodyText: This line is adding the generated resources to  sourceset, not replacing. The normal resources are in the sourceset by default, adding them a second time would be redundant.
